attributes.action: save Denbigh asylum from being knocked down!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The asylum's buildings are historic and beautiful and should not be knocked down! Help save it for the nation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Denbigh asylum from being knocked down!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18290


Prime Minister's Office
